helper.SUMESS:
ğŸ’   *How add numbers to the sudo without going to heroku*  ğŸ’   

â‡ï¸ Make the numbers that you want to set sudo as, 94704296532 
(International format wothout *+* and *spaces*)
â‡ï¸ .setvar sudo=94xxxxxxxxx,0,

helper.BLOCKMESS:
*ğŸ’  How to disable bot for unwanted groups ğŸ’ *

*â‡ï¸ How to get the Jid number of the group that you wants to Chat Block.*

âš™ï¸ To get the Jid number, go to the group that you want to Chat Block. Send a command to the group as *.jid* then you will get the Jid number of that particular group.
â‡ï¸ Take the only the numbers from the Jid number that you got *(copy only the number)*.

The way you get the Jid number of that particular group :-
Chat's JID address: ```977489037858-1329946663@g.us```

From this we should only take :- *977489037858-1329946663* the numbers.

â‡ï¸ Now copy the numbers and log in to your heroku account, then go to the bot application of your bot.
â‡ï¸ Go to the settings.
â‡ï¸ You will see a button as *Reveal Config Vars* click on that button.
â‡ï¸ After that you will see the Config Vars of your Application. Now scroll down until you get *BLOCK_CHAT*
â‡ï¸ After you found BLOCK_CHAT click the editor pencil corresponding to it.Then you will go to a page with two boxes.
â‡ï¸ On the new page that you got, in the box named as *VALUE* paste the Jid number as :- 
*977489037858-1329946663,* 
â‡ï¸ The click on the *SAVE CHANGES* button.
â‡ï¸ Now click the *MORE* button in top right conner, and click on the *Restart all dynos* and restart the bot.

âš ï¸ When you are adding Jid number of many groups add them as :-
```xxxxxxxxx-xxxxxxx,xxxxxxxxx-xxxxxxx,xxxxxxxxx-xxxxxxx,```

*ğŸ’  Easy way to BLOCK_CHAT. ğŸ’ *
â‡ï¸ .setvar BLOCK_CHAT=xxxxxxxxx-xxxxxxx,xxxxxxxxx-xxxxxxx,

á´‹ÉªÉ´É¢ Ê€á´á´á´‡á´ Â® á´˜á´œÊ™ÊŸÉªá´„ á´‡á´…Éªá´›Éªá´É´
helper.PLUGINNOTE:
ğŸ’  *ğŸ’  *How to install Queen Amdi External Plugins?* ğŸ’ 

â‡ï¸ Write *.search* command to get plugin links.
â‡ï¸ Now, choose your plugin and copy your plugin link.
â‡ï¸ Wirte *.install plugin_link* and send it.
â‡ï¸ It will simply installed.


ğŸ’  *How to remove external plugins?* ğŸ’ 

â‡ï¸ Write *.plugin* to get installed plugin list.

â‡ï¸ Now, Take plugin name and type *.remove plugin_name*

helper.HAPIKEY:
ğŸ’  *How to change Heroku API KEY ?* ğŸ’ 

â‡ï¸ First go _*https://dashboard.heroku.com/account*_
â‡ï¸ Scoll down & you can see *Reveal* button
â‡ï¸ Touch on *Reveal* button & copy that key
â‡ï¸ Now go  _*https://dashboard.heroku.com/*_ & select your bot application
â‡ï¸ Go to Settings and scroll down you can see the *reveal config vars* button.
â‡ï¸ Touch it & scroll down you can see ther var *HEROKU_API_KEY*
â‡ï¸ Touch on the pencil . You can edit it now
â‡ï¸ Paste the API Key you copied before
â‡ï¸ After edit click *save changes* button & *restart all dynos*

á´‹ÉªÉ´É¢ Ê€á´á´á´‡á´ Â® á´˜á´œÊ™ÊŸÉªá´„ á´‡á´…Éªá´›Éªá´É´
